comment: Don't worry. It's pretty much the same entities that do it to everybody. Don't feed 'em and they eventually go find easier targets to trigger. As James Woods says, "Instablock" Welcome to !!
amr:
# ::snt Don't worry. It's pretty much the same entities that do it to everybody. Don't feed 'em and they eventually go find easier targets to trigger. As James Woods says, "Instablock" Welcome to !!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / worry-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you))
      :snt2 (e / entity
            :ARG1-of (s / same-01
                  :mod (p / pretty-much))
            :ARG0-of (d / do-02
                  :ARG1 (ii / it)
                  :ARG2 (e2 / everybody)))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (f / feed-01
                  :polarity -
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (t / they))
            :op2 (g / go-05
                  :ARG0 (t2 / they
                        :ARG1 (f2 / find-01
                              :ARG1 (t3 / target
                                    :ARG1-of (t4 / trigger-01
                                          :ARG0 t2)
                                    :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                                          :ARG2 (e3 / easy-05
                                                :ARG1 t3)
                                          :ARG3 (m2 / more))))
                        :ARG0-of f2
                        :time (e4 / eventual)))
            :snt4 (w2 / welcome-01
                  :ARG2 (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Instablock"))
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / say-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "James"
                                    :op2 "Woods"))))))

comment: The N word is highly offensive.   All ethnicities and social groups deserve tolerance.

comment: It doesn't make sense to hate an entire race based on the actions of a few people.
amr:
